What <S%G5101><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> my <S%G3427><s%> reward <S%G3408><s%> then <S%G3767><s%>? I <S%G1473><s%> therefore <S%G5106><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> run <S%G5143><s%>, not <S%G3756><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> uncertainly <S%G84><s%>; so <S%G3779><s%> fight I <S%G4438><s%>, not <S%G3756><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> one that beats <S%G1194><s%> the air <S%G109><s%>:
